title: Group of teenagers gathered around Lyda Jo Boswell wearing corsage and standing behind cake, for her sweet sixteen birthday party, including Carolyn McCraw Carter and Karole Turner seated on left, Jeanette Terry and Ann Graves Tanksley seated on right, and standing: David Cook, Jane Graves, Kay Crawford, Gwendolyn "Gwen" Poinsette, Robert "Bobby" Grant, Barbara Ann Boswell Ricketts, Raymond Harris, Margaret Austin, MacDonald Terry, Lyda Jo Boswell, John E. Trower, Mary Method Price, Everett Metz, Marcia Nickens Metz, Edward McMillan, Cecelia Trower (Epperson), and Henry Reid leaning forward, in Boswell home, Hollace Street, Hill District
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
